description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，现任中央港澳工作领导小组常务副组长、中共中央港澳工作办公室主任、国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former deputy national leader, currently serving as the executive deputy head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee, and Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中共中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中共中央港澳工作办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央港澳工作办公室
en: Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责港澳工作的议事协调机构的办事机构，是中共中央的直属机构。
description.en: The working agency of the deliberation and coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macao affairs, it is a direct subordinate body of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任、香港中联办主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任、澳门中联办主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the Macau Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者、官员，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese scholar and official, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, it is the organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十三届全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任全国政协秘书长时的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Xia Baolong as Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任全国政协秘书长时的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Xia Baolong as Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 国务院港澳事务办公室

zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室
en: Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责香港和澳门事务的办事机构，是中共中央港澳工作办公室的加挂牌子。
description.en: The working body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macao affairs, operating concurrently as the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任国务院港澳事务办公室主任时的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Xia Baolong as Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任浙江省委书记时的副手及继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, deputy and successor to Xia Baolong as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任浙江省委书记时的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Xia Baolong as Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee.

nodes.id: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Executive Vice Governor when Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Xia Baolong as Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，夏宝龙的出生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Xia Baolong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 天津市河西区职工大学

zh-cn: 天津市河西区职工大学

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的成人高等学校。
description.en: An adult higher education institution located in Tianjin.

nodes.id: 中国共产党天津市委员会党校

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会党校
en: Party School of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会培养党员干部的学校。
description.en: The school of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China for training party cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾任北京大学校长，夏宝龙的博士生导师。
description.en: Chinese economist, former President of Peking University, and doctoral advisor to Xia Baolong.

nodes.id: 中共浙江省委政法委员会

zh-cn: 中共浙江省委政法委员会
en: Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙的父亲，曾参加国民党北伐和红军长征。
description.en: Father of Xia Baolong, participated in the Northern Expedition and the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的军事学校。
description.en: A military academy during the period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略性军事转移。
description.en: A strategic military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的武装力量之一。
description.en: One of the armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' during the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军天津市军事管制委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军天津市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年中国人民解放军控制天津后设立的军事管制机构。
description.en: The military control commission established in Tianjin after it was controlled by the People's Liberation Army in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治家，曾任马来西亚总理。
description.en: Malaysian politician who served as the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 曾任马来西亚最高元首。
description.en: Former Yang di-Pertuan Agong (Supreme Head of State) of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 苏丹前总统。
description.en: Former President of Sudan.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会环境与资源保护委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会环境与资源保护委员会
en: Environment Protection and Resources Conservation Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 一场在香港发生的大规模社会运动，旨在反对《逃犯条例》修订草案。
description.en: A large-scale social movement in Hong Kong against the proposed amendments to the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance.

nodes.id: 中央港澳工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央港澳工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责领导香港和澳门两个特别行政区工作的议事协调机构。
description.en: A deliberation and coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for leading the work in the Hong Kong and Macao Special Administrative Regions.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区现任行政长官。
description.en: The current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港机场管理局主席。
description.en: Chairman of the Airport Authority Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府律政司司长。
description.en: Secretary for Justice of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府环境及生态局局长。
description.en: Secretary for Environment and Ecology of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府财政司司长。
description.en: Financial Secretary of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省开展的一项旨在改造旧住宅区、旧厂区、城中村和拆除违法建筑的行动。
description.en: A campaign in Zhejiang Province aimed at renovating old residential areas, old factory areas, urban villages, and demolishing illegal structures.

description.zh-cn: 美国的联邦行政部门，负责管理美国联邦政府的财政事务。
description.en: An executive department of the U.S. federal government, responsible for managing the financial affairs of the United States federal government.

description.zh-cn: 一项美国联邦法律，旨在对据信对中国未能履行《中英联合声明》义务负责的个人和实体实施制裁。
description.en: A U.S. federal law that imposes sanctions on individuals and entities determined to be responsible for China's failure to meet its obligations under the Sino-British Joint Declaration.

description.zh-cn: 一种通过公开行进来表达政治或社会诉求的集体行动。
description.en: A form of collective action to express political or social demands through a public march.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，美国副总统。
description.en: American politician, Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府律政司副司长。
description.en: Deputy Secretary for Justice of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

relationships.target: 中共中央港澳工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任中共中央港澳工作办公室主任。
description.en: Xia Baolong serves as the Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 国务院港澳事务办公室

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙兼任国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: Xia Baolong concurrently serves as the Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任第十三届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Xia Baolong served as the Vice Chairman of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙兼任第十三届全国政协秘书长。
description.en: Xia Baolong concurrently served as the Secretary-General of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任中共浙江省委书记。
description.en: Xia Baolong served as the Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Xia Baolong served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙于2011年8月任浙江省代省长，2012年1月正式当选为省长。
description.en: Xia Baolong became the Acting Governor of Zhejiang in August 2011 and was officially elected Governor in January 2012.

relationships.target: 中央港澳工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任中央港澳工作领导小组常务副组长。
description.en: Xia Baolong serves as the Executive Deputy Head of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macao Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙于1973年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xia Baolong joined the Communist Party of China in November 1973.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京大学经济学院政治经济学专业在职研究生学习，获得经济学博士学位。
description.en: Xia Baolong studied in the Political Economy major at the School of Economics, Peking University, as an on-the-job postgraduate student, and obtained a Doctor of Economics degree.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京大学攻读博士学位期间的导师为吴树青。
description.en: Wu Shuqing was Xia Baolong's advisor during his doctoral studies at Peking University.

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在担任中共浙江省委副书记期间，是时任省委书记习近平的副手。
description.en: When Xia Baolong served as Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, he was the deputy to then-Provincial Party Secretary Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 全国政协副主席、秘书长
position.en: Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在担任全国政协副主席和秘书长期间，主席是汪洋。
description.en: While Xia Baolong served as Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee, the Chairman was Wang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任浙江省省长期间，省委书记是赵洪祝。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, the Provincial Party Secretary was Zhao Hongzhu.

position.zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任国务院港澳事务办公室主任期间，国务院总理是李克强。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the Premier was Li Keqiang.

position.zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任国务院港澳事务办公室主任期间，国务院总理是李强。
description.en: While Xia Baolong is Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the Premier is Li Qiang.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央港澳工作办公室副主任
position.en: Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 周霁是中共中央港澳工作办公室主任夏宝龙的副手。
description.en: Zhou Ji is a deputy to Xia Baolong, Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 中共浙江省委副书记、省长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor

description.zh-cn: 在夏宝龙担任浙江省委书记期间，李强担任省委副书记、省长。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Li Qiang served as Deputy Secretary and Governor.

position.zh-cn: 中共浙江省委副书记、省长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor

description.zh-cn: 在夏宝龙担任浙江省委书记期间，车俊接替李强担任省委副书记、省长。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, Che Jun succeeded Li Qiang as Deputy Secretary and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙担任浙江省省长期间，龚正任常务副省长。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, Gong Zheng served as Executive Vice Governor.

position.zh-cn: 国务院港澳事务办公室副主任（正部长级）
position.en: Deputy Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council (Ministerial Level)

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙接任国务院港澳事务办公室主任后，原主任张晓明改任为副主任。
description.en: After Xia Baolong took over as Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the former director Zhang Xiaoming was reassigned as Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 夏振中是夏宝龙的父亲。
description.en: Xia Zhenzhong is Xia Baolong's father.

description.zh-cn: 夏振中是黄埔军校第二期毕业生。
description.en: Xia Zhenzhong graduated from the second class of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 夏振中参加过红军长征。
description.en: Xia Zhenzhong participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 夏振中曾被编入新四军。
description.en: Xia Zhenzhong was incorporated into the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 平津战役后，夏振中任职天津市军事管制委员会。
description.en: After the Pingjin Campaign, Xia Zhenzhong took a position at the Tianjin Military Control Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军天津市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 夏振中在平津战役后任职于天津市军事管制委员会。
description.en: Xia Zhenzhong served in the Tianjin Military Control Commission after the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在宁波会见了马来西亚前首相马哈迪·莫哈末一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad and his delegation in Ningbo.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在杭州会见了马来西亚最高元首端姑阿都哈林一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with the Supreme Head of State of Malaysia, Tuanku Abdul Halim, and his delegation in Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在杭州会见了来访的苏丹总统巴希尔一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with the visiting Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir and his delegation in Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在深圳主持座谈会，会见了香港特区行政长官李家超。
description.en: Xia Baolong chaired a symposium in Shenzhen and met with Hong Kong SAR Chief Executive John Lee Ka-chiu.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京会见香港机场管理局主席林天福一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with Fred Lam Tin-fuk, Chairman of the Airport Authority Hong Kong, and his delegation in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京会见香港特区政府律政司司长林定国一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with Paul Lam Ting-kwok, Secretary for Justice of the HKSAR Government, and his delegation in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京会见香港特区政府环境及生态局局长谢展寰一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with Tse Chin-wan, Secretary for Environment and Ecology of the HKSAR Government, and his delegation in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在北京会见香港特区政府财政司司长陈茂波一行。
description.en: Xia Baolong met with Paul Chan Mo-po, Financial Secretary of the HKSAR Government, and his delegation in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在此期间会见了香港特区政府律政司副司长张国钧。
description.en: During this period, Xia Baolong met with Horace Cheung Kwok-kwan, Deputy Secretary for Justice of the HKSAR Government.

relationships.source: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 在2019年反对逃犯条例修订草案运动后，夏宝龙于2020年2月13日被任命兼任国务院港澳事务办公室主任，以应对香港局势。
description.en: Following the 2019 Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement, Xia Baolong was appointed to concurrently serve as Director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council on February 13, 2020, to handle the situation in Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙将“反修例运动”定性为“颜色革命”和“黑暴”，并做出强硬表态准备出手抗击，体现其反对立场。
description.en: Xia Baolong labeled the 'Anti-Extradition Law Movement' as a 'color revolution' and 'black violence,' and made a tough stance to prepare for a counterattack, reflecting his opposition.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共浙江省委书记的夏宝龙开始推动“三改一拆”运动。
description.en: Xia Baolong, then Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee, initiated the 'Three Renovations and One Demolition' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 因被指“损害香港自治”，夏宝龙被美国财政部依据《香港自治法》制裁。
description.en: Xia Baolong was sanctioned by the U.S. Department of the Treasury under the Hong Kong Autonomy Act for 'undermining Hong Kong's autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部依据《香港自治法》对夏宝龙等官员实施制裁。
description.en: The U.S. Department of the Treasury imposed sanctions on officials including Xia Baolong based on the Hong Kong Autonomy Act.

description.zh-cn: 夏宝龙在讲话中表示，游行不是表达诉求的唯一方式，且容易被骑劫，诱发社会对抗，不鼓励此种行为。
description.en: In a speech, Xia Baolong stated that protest marches are not the only way to express demands and can be easily hijacked, leading to social confrontation, thereby discouraging such activities.

description.zh-cn: 在全民国家安全教育日致辞中，夏宝龙回应并反驳了美国副总统万斯的“乡巴佬”言论。
description.en: In his speech on National Security Education Day, Xia Baolong responded to and refuted the 'hillbilly' remarks made by U.S. Vice President J. D. Vance.
